name: Waffle Time!
description:
Time to sit back, relax, and crunch some virtual waffles! You hunger for waffle... Waffle is calling to you... YOU MUST EAT WAFFLE!!!

art, code, and game design by me!

music by my buddy toad https://www.youtube.com/toadodyssey toad's got some absolutely amazing songs on her YouTube channel!

Hope gold font by Somepx https://twitter.com/somepx please check out their other super cool fonts!

Join my discord! https://discord.gg/KRNZv47fRJ

tools: Unity 2020.3, Aseprite, Audacity, Visual Studio.
